content: this gorgeous poncho is easy and works up fast we will use single and double crochets and chains to make it we will make it using 4 granny squares add fringes to give a nice boho look the wrap cardigan can be made from 4 squares there is no sewing involved skill level advanced beginner easy beginner tutorial available sizes s/m l/xl 2xl/3xl 4xl/5xl material yarn any medium weight/ weight 4 yarn of your choice can be used suggested yarn red heart super saver any shade amount needed along with hood and fringes 700 900 1200 1500 grams crochet hook 6 5 mm or an k size hook 6 mm or j size hook for joining notions stitch markers tapestry needle scissors measuring tape details the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is a 17 page pdf pattern a print friendly version is available please ask me for it if so desired it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern round by round notes with pictures it does not include finished product it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it immediately after purchase you will receive a pdf crochet pattern which is a digital download due to the nature of patterns this crochet pattern may not be exchanged or returned for a refund all sales are final please feel free to reach out anytime i am happy to help permissions/ copyright- please feel free to sell your finished items on a small scale but use of your own photos is required all pictures and patterns are copyright to lets all crochet © while selling finished items credit given to lets all crochet is appreciated do not use pictures or patterns for resale purposes the pattern cannot be shared altered or copied in any form youtube tutorials 1 etsy shop 2 instagram 3 1 https //www youtube com/c/letsallcrochet/ 2 https //www etsy com/in-en/shop/letsallcrochet 3 https //www instagram com/letsallcrochet1989/
